The new VED rules state that current owners of registered vehicles will only be entitled, at the time of disposal, to repayment of VED in respect of each full month of unused tax.
Given the fact that the whole VED system is computerised why is it not possible to repay VED in respect of the number of days of unused tax
Not unexpectedly, the motoring public see this change as an unlegislated increase in VED...
